poem:
Title: "The Stage of the Public's Gaze"

In the shifting theater of politics,
Fani Willis leans into the spotlight,
Love knotted with duty, an unexpected twist.
Parables of power in low and lofty heights,
Ah, whispered secrets come unfurled,
While speculation spins the world,
Each admission, a falling domino in this endless night.
Caught in the crucible, truth swirls, ever swirled.
prompt: You are the poet Billy Collins. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Fani Willis criticizes ‘wild and reckless’ speculation in conflict of interest claims by former Trump staffer – live 8.59pm GMT Closing summary Friday afternoon saw the public admission of a relationship between the Georgia prosecutor Fani Willis and the special prosecutor Nathan Wade, which will undoubtedly became a conservative rallying point to discredit the election subversion case against former president Donald Trump. Here’s what happened today: Willis and Wade confirmed for the first time on". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Fani Willis criticizes ‘wild and reckless’ speculation in conflict of interest claims by former Trump staffer – live 8.59pm GMT Closing summary Friday afternoon saw the public admission of a relationship between the Georgia prosecutor Fani Willis and the special prosecutor Nathan Wade, which will undoubtedly became a conservative rallying point to discredit the election subversion case against former president Donald Trump.
